name: breadcrumbs
description: Add typed-links to your Obsidian notes

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:esbuild
scripts.version:prod: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json package.json
scripts.version:beta: node version-bump-beta.mjs && git add manifest-beta.json versions.json package.json
scripts.release:beta: npm run version:beta && git commit -m 'release:beta' && git push origin master:master && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
scripts.coverage:ui: vitest run --coverage --coverage.include 'src/**' --coverage.reporter html && npx vite preview --outDir ./coverage --open

author: SkepticMystic
